original_title: Minor earth tremor reported in Beruwala, coastal areas
original_body_lines: A minor earth tremor of Magnitude 3.7 on the Richter scale was reported in the seas, 24 km away from Beruwala a short while ago, and it was felt in several surrounding areas, the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau said.
The Disaster Management Centre said however there was no threat from the earth tremor reported in the Beruwala seas.
